name: ASCENSION (Brown-RISD Game Developers, Nicole Strubinski)
description:
Play as a cute space explorer in a zero-gravity space station! Use your ray gun to ascend through the twists and turns and knock evil aliens out of your way!

Controls:

LMB - shoot, propel yourself in the opposite direction

SPACE BAR - DASH off of walls to move through rooms in the direction you're facing

ESC - pause, escape

Credits:

Nicole Strubinski: Producer, 3D Artist

Evan Samuel Mickelson: Programmer, Level Designer, and Producer

Dexter McChesney: Level and Gameplay Designer
